title: IIFL Finance buys back $50 million overseas bonds, reduces cost of funds by 225 bps - Moneycontrol
content: IIFL Finance buys back $50 million overseas bonds, reduces cost of funds by 225 bps  Moneycontrol
description: The company has over the past two years bought back bonds worth $26.3 million in various tranches, and launched a tender offer on March 21, 2022, to buy back another $50 million worth of bonds.
